item.title: Pushlish R blogdown by Netlify
item.description: Iâ€™m a noobie on using Github and Hugo. ðŸ˜Š It took me quite a while to figure out how to use version control on Github through Rstudio. Some of the hickhups were caused by not understanding the structure and logic of Github and the blogdown for configuration because I took a shortcut by googling and trials & errors and didnâ€™t feel like reading all the details of the Yihuiâ€™s excellent guidlines.

item.title: R Markdown Introduction
item.description: R Markdown The first time that I used R Markdown was back to 2014 when I was in grduate school. Unfortunately, I havenâ€™t used this as much as I would like to due to the inconvinience with IT in the hospital. Iâ€™m slowling trying to use Rstudio more and more as SAS has limited options on some analysis. This will be great for documenting R code and math expressions.
